name: Priya and rehwa
greetingText: I really likeD your name btw!
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: But unfortunatley this meeting took a sad turn and you guys endded being terribly sick :(
text2: So i hope you guys get in the best of state as sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooonn as possible and your tripo can end on a good note!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
text3: ANd priyas card and drawing were reallly awesome.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something too
wishHeading: PLS VISIT US AGAIN AND THE NEXT TIME THERE WONT BE ANY PROBLEM!!!!!!!!!!
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
